document_data.name: Zahara's Krakens
document_data.mainbody: '''Zahara's Krakens''' were a mercenary company based in the [[Sword Coast]] around [[1358 DR]]. They had a lucrative business of protecting shipping. Zahara the Shark was the human female leader of the crew.
document_data.Tactics: Whilst attacking a port, they tried to kept destruction to a minimum. The Krakens only did this if it served a noble cause, like deposing an evil lord.
document_data.Organization: The Krakens had five small ships. Each ship had onboard 15 crew members, 30 marines, five spellcasters. One of the ships had, unknown to general public, a [[spelljamming helm]] that permitted them to fly in desperate occasion.
document_data.Contracts: The Krakens took 500 [[gold piece]] for a week or any portion thereof, half in advance. They asked terrestrial support to attack a port.
